items.sentence: A mixture of snow and rain was falling from the sky.
Have you ever been diagnosed with a heart condition?
Does anyone in your close family have heart disease?
I don't know the woman who's talking to our teacher.
I want Tom to know that he isn't allowed to do that.
You never told me that you were allergic to peanuts.
Tom probably isn't ever going to be able to do that.
Every time I see Tom, he seems to be playing a game.
As Tom ran across the finish line, everyone cheered.
Tom saw vultures flying overhead and began to worry.
